subject: p15809646
History: -year-old male patient with respiratory failure. Study requested for evaluation of interval change.
Findings: As compared to prior chest radiograph from, there has been interval improvement of opacities along the right lower lung. There is bibasilar atelectasis. Mild cardiomegaly is unchanged. There are no pleural effusions or pneumothorax. An ET tube ends 39 cm above the carina. Right jugular line is unchanged in position.
Impression: Interval improvement of opacities along the right lower lung with bibasilar atelectasis.
